p: Biological diversity of the Komi Republic region includes 929 fungi, 1217 vascular plants, 653 moss, 1020 lichen, 2,000 algae, more than 3,500 arachnid, more than 6,000 insect, 50 fish, six amphibian, five reptile, 265 bird, and 57 mammal species. There are 237 forest, floristic, meadow, marsh, ichthyological, ornithological, and geo logical reserves and natural monuments on the territory of Komi. The Pechora-Ilych State Reserve and the Yugyd Va National Park occupy 13.5% of the total territory of the republic ( Ponomarev and Tatarinov 2012).
